text_block_list.text: My predecessor retired and decided to put me in charge of Team <Sirius>.
In the beginning, I was just desperate to put the team back together, but―
One by one, Uma Musume joined along with their dreams.
As part of the team, I learned that my role as trainer was to support those dreams.
To spend the days side-by-side with them as they chased their dreams.
And going forward, that's how Team <Sirius> would continue on―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: So you were here, Trainer-san. There's still some time until the main race will start.
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is taking the stage, so I wanted to see it from up close.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ……Fufuu, the current <Sirius> started here too, on this stage, in this place, didn't it?
It felt like an instant, but it also felt like forever ago…… It's a really mysterious feeling.
It felt like an instant, but it also felt like forever ago…… It's a really mysterious feeling.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ……truly, that's how it felt.
……at that time, I'm grateful that you remained, McQueen.
……at that time, I'm grateful that you remained, McQueen.
Because you were here, I was able to come this far.
Because you were here, I was able to come this far.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I should be the one saying that― and I'm sure everyone on the team feels the same.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Because Trainer-san was there, always supporting the Uma Musume and their dreams, we were able to continue running up until now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Because Trainer-san was there, we are still running today.
……still running today, huh.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: The biggest event closing out the year, the 『Arima Kinen』. 14 Uma Musume have come to this stage to compete.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: In this battle of the century, half of the participants are G1 Uma Musume. The excitement of the spectators in the stands is palpable.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Just which Uma Musume will take hold of glory in this Grand Prix?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: To think I'd be standing here on such a big stage like a Grand Prix race, just a little while ago I never would have imagined it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Tsuru-chan.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Even now, I'm still a little frustrated that I couldn't enter any Classic races……

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: President Rudolph― a "Triple Crown Uma Musume", I couldn't help admiring her, and being in a Classic race was my dream when I was small.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: 『Satsuki Sho』 『Japan Derby』 『Kikka Sho』…… being unable to stand on that once in a lifetime stage even once……

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: But you know, even though I couldn't fulfill that dream, in exchange a newer, bigger dream took its place.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: That I would definitely, definitely run together with everyone!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: I would do my best, catch up, and run with everyone― and then I wanted to win!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: All of this is because I was able to keep watching Spe-chan and everyone else continue running! It's because you showed me that dream!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: That's why, today, in this moment, I'm going to run with all I've got!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Me too, I'll be running with all my strength!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: ……Suu～…… Huu～……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: For the sake of this day, I've continued working hard―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Together with Ryan-oneesama's feelings, I'll definitely run through and take the lead.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Bright-san, she's so focused……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Me too, I need to get serious……!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Thanks for waiting, Spe-chan. Finally, this day has come.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass-chan……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Your run at the 『Japan Cup』, was truly wonderful. As you promised, you became the Uma Musume that I want to win against the most.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I'll show you that I can chase and surpass you, to take hold of my own dream.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Me too, this time for sure, I'll show you that I can surpass you!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: As "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", I'll win against Grass-chan!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Nakayama's main race, the 『Arima Kinen』, the participating Uma Musume make their appearance on the turf!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: 'The one to overturn the "Golden Generation" will be me!' T. M. Opera O!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Hidden deep within her heart is an impassioned pride! The Mejiro family's preeminent stayer, Mejiro Bright!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: This Uma Musume doesn't know the meaning of the words 'giving up'! The late-bloomer, and secret weapon of the "Golden Generation", Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: The returnee with the lovely chestnut hair, but within her heart dwells the Japanese spirit! The "Monster" with 2 consecutive Grand Prix victories, Grass Wonder!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: And finally, carrying the dreams of all of Japan, and grasping a splendid victory, the "Supreme Commander of Japan", Special Week!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh! Spe's finally made her appearance!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: It looks like…… she isn't nervous at all.

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Rather than that, she looks more dignified!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
text_block_list.text: As expected of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"～! Let's cheer with all we've got!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Do your beeeeeest～ Spe-chaaaaan～! Uoooooooh～!!!!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Do your best～ "Supreme Commander of Japan"～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, you should try calling out to her too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: So that Special Week-san can once again become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" for everyone.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, so that the mantle created by <Sirius> so far, can carry on with another amazing race……

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I wonder what the next one to join the team will be like.
……no matter what dream the next girl brings, I'll do my best to make sure we can fulfill that dream, together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's all cheer her on!
Yeah, show them what <Sirius> can really do, Spe!
Yeah, show them what <Sirius> can really do, Spe!
